Type:
Parameter type: <Vlan::RemoteIdPppoe>
Format:
( disable
| customer-id
| physical-id )
Possible values:
- disable : no remote id
- customer-id : customer identity as remote id
- physical-id : physical line identity as remote id
Description:
optional parameter with default
value: "disable"
The parameter is not visible
during creation.
configure the remote id
sub-option for PPPoE relay tag

Type:
Parameter type: <Vlan::NewSecureForward>
Format:
( inherit
| disable
| enable )
Possible values:
- inherit : inherit new-secure-forwarding
- disable : disable new-secure-forwarding
- enable : enable new-secure-forwarding
Description:
optional parameter with default
value: "inherit"
enable secure forwarding for the
VLAN (On GPON and L2+ LT
boards, secure forwarding for
S+C L2 Forwarders can only be
controlled at S-VLAN level, not
individually at S+C-VLAN
level.)

Type:
Parameter type: <Vlan::MacAgingTime>
Format:
- mac aging time in seconds
- unit: sec
- range: [-1,10...1000000]
Description:
optional parameter with default
value: -1
configure MAC aging time in
seconds; in case of default,the
system-level value is applicable.

Type:
Parameter type: <Vlan::Dhcpv6InterfaceId>
Format:
( disable
| customer-id
| physical-id
| ccsa-format )
Possible values:
- disable : no interface id
- customer-id : customer identity as interface id
- physical-id : physical line identity as interface id
- ccsa-format : interface id in ccsa format
Description:
optional parameter with default
value: "disable"
The parameter is not visible
during creation.
DHCPv6 interface id control

Type:
Parameter type: <Vlan::Dhcpv6RemoteId>
Format:
( disable
| customer-id
| physical-id )
Possible values:
- disable : no interface id
- customer-id : customer identity as interface id
- physical-id : physical line identity as interface id
Description:
optional parameter with default
value: "disable"
The parameter is not visible
during creation.
DHCPv6 remote id control

Type:
Parameter type: <Vlan::Dhcpv6RelayId>
Format:
( disable
| duid-ll )
Possible values:
- disable : no dhcpv6 relay-id
- duid-ll : two octet network hardware type code, followed
by the link-layer address
Description:
optional parameter with default
value: "disable"
The parameter is not visible
during creation.
DHCPv6 relay id control

optional parameter with default
value: "untrusted"
The parameter is not visible
during creation.
